name: planTopia (FIT Games)
description:
planTopia is challenging adventure, third person shooter. 

Experience a rush by avoiding obstacles and fighting against evil lord Karkoff's servants. Bring back home secret potion, source of life on planTopia!

Experience the adventure with:

  • Four different types of enemies.
  • Two bosses.
  • A lot of different obstacles like moving platforms, tilting bridges and even more.

Feel the adventure and press play.

Computer Graphics, second year students project by:

  • Azra Smajić
  • Tajib Vikalo
